医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
心血管护理方面的性别差异可能与女性中风风险较高有关根据女子学院医院、大学健康网络 (UHN) 彼得蒙克心脏中心 (PMCC) 和 ICES 的一项新研究，患有房颤的女性中风风险较高可能与心血管护理方面的性别差异有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Sex-based-disparities-in-cardioangio-care-may-be-linked-to-higher-中风-risk-among-females.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Sex-based-disparities-in-cardioangio-care-may-be-linked-to-higher-中风-risk-among-females.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09ef287a-6caf-4030-b658-1f66fb6b10ac Wed, 30 Aug 2023 18:56:35 -0400 Sex-based disparities in cardiovascular care may be linked to higher stroke risk among females
研究发现使用现有抗癌药物可能治愈艾滋病毒一种现有的血癌药物已显示出杀死“沉默”艾滋病毒细胞和延迟再感染的希望，这是一项重大的临床前发现，可能会在未来治愈该疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Study-finds-pottial-HIV-cure-using-existing-cancer-drug.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Study-finds-pottial-HIV-cure-using-existing-cancer-drug.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0383b215-c717-4c65-bee4-78a8ca86d96c Wed, 30 Aug 2023 18:50:00 -0400 Study finds potential HIV cure using existing cancer drug
人造抗体成功预防器官移植后排斥反应杜克大学健康中心的研究人员报告说，在接受肾移植的灵长类动物身上进行测试时，一种人造抗体成功地防止了器官排斥。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Man-made-antibody-successively-prevents-organ-rejection-after-transplantation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Man-made-antibody-successively-prevents-organ-rejection-after-transplantation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da928640-eaa7-46c8-b3e3-c063c14dce47 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 18:10:08 -0400 Man-made antibody successfully prevents organ rejection after transplantation
基因变异可预防阿尔茨海默病和帕金森病斯坦福大学医学院的研究人员及其同事了解到，大约五分之一的人携带一种基因，尽管这种基因在很大程度上不为人所知，但似乎可以预防阿尔茨海默病和帕金森病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Gene-variant-protects-against-Alzheimers-and-Parkinsons-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Gene-variant-protects-against-Alzheimers-and-Parkinsons-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88a0415b-46cb-4d57-92b2-8595811ef6f2 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 17:56:05 -0400 Gene variant protects against Alzheimer's and Parkinson's diseases
在 COVID-19 大流行期间，儿童可能经历了“过度”加倍的情况华盛顿州立大学研究人员领导的一项研究表明，当 COVID-19 首次袭击美国时，祖父母似乎充当了重要的私人安全网。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Children-may-have-experienced-e2809cexcesse2809d-doubling-up-during-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Children-may-have-experienced-e2809cexcesse2809d-doubling-up-during-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee9b59bc-7369-4113-94c9-199d52eaa284 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 17:47:57 -0400 Children may have experienced “excess” doubling up during COVID-19 pandemic
研究表明，当药物杀死肠道中的“好”细菌时，抗生素耐药性细菌就会大量繁殖当药物杀死肠道中的“好”细菌时，抗生素耐药性细菌会获得额外的营养并大量繁殖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Antibiotic-pressive-bacteria-thrive-when-the-drugs-kill-good-bacteria-in-the-gut-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Antibiotic-pressive-bacteria-thrive-when-the-drugs-kill-good-bacteria-in-the-gut-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8be5b790-9198-4931-8fe3-41c0ecfa5ed0 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 17:37:35 -0400 Antibiotic-resistant bacteria thrive when the drugs kill 'good' bacteria in the gut, study shows
英格兰流感和 COVID-19 疫苗计划将比计划提前启动作为识别出新的 COVID-19 变种后的预防措施，今年的秋季流感和 COVID-19 疫苗计划将在英格兰提前启动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Flu-and-COVID-19-vaccine-programs-to-start-earlier-than-planned-in-England.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Flu-and-COVID-19-vaccine-programs-to-start-earlier-than-planned-in-England.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47aed220-c2f9-49ad-b47b-367689d6af90 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 16:11:25 -0400 Flu and COVID-19 vaccine programs to start earlier than planned in England
科学家创建突变细菌库来研究抗生素耐药性现代医学依靠抗生素通过破坏细菌细胞内的靶标来治疗感染。一旦进入这些细胞，抗生素就会与特定酶靶点上的某些位点结合，以阻止细菌生长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Scientists-create-library-of-mutant-bacteria-to-study-antibiotic-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Scientists-create-library-of-mutant-bacteria-to-study-antibiotic-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b17bb03-d15c-42e0-a633-369ef3d66f9c Wed, 30 Aug 2023 16:08:00 -0400 Scientists create library of mutant bacteria to study antibiotic resistance
关于一种免疫细胞的新发现可能为改进免疫疗法铺平道路关于一种免疫细胞的新发现可以为肺癌患者提供更准确的预后，并更好地确定谁将从免疫疗法中受益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/New-discoveries-about-a-type-of-immune-cells-could-pave-the-way-for-improved-immunotherapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/New-discoveries-about-a-type-of-immune-cells-could-pave-the-way-for-improved-immunotherapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25f13866-bbc7-46b8-b4ce-c160df2b2524 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 15:55:44 -0400 New discoveries about a type of immune cells could pave the way for improved immunotherapies
吸烟会增加患抑郁症和双相情感障碍的风险我们大多数人都知道吸烟不健康。香烟包装上显示令人震惊的图片，警告患病的肺部和腐烂的牙齿。我们经常在媒体上听到吸烟如何导致各种癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Smoking-linked-to-increased-risk-of-depression-bipolar-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Smoking-linked-to-increased-risk-of-depression-bipolar-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=883c7478-546c-4337-86af-14a5f3689e84 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 15:37:37 -0400 Smoking linked to increased risk of depression, bipolar disorder
